#TeamCruz had an excellent time celebrating America's birthday in McAllen today! #txsen #cruzcrew #independenceday #july4th http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD57EhGW0AIQ-gi.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD57EmvXcAAflaI.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD57EkzXkAAem6U.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD57ElaW0AUUqWx.jpg
I'm grateful to the men & women who made this trip to Afghanistan possible. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD56lwVXsAU_ZnG.jpg
We also visited Forward Operating Base Gamberi to hear from the soldiers involved in training Afghan counterparts in Eastern Afghanistan. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD56TbsXYAEjFfP.jpg
We had the opportunity to thank the Marine Security Guards who protect our Embassy in Kabul. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD55w3dWAAQZBgh.jpg
Our deployed troops are incredible, & we got to participate in a promotion & award ceremony for a group of them. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD55WXCXYAEfOJ6.jpg
Today I also got to have lunch with servicemembers from Massachusetts deployed to Afghanistan. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD55BfjWAAAXmgc.jpg
We met with Afghanistan's top leaders in Kabul and received an operational update from General Nicholson and his team.
When General Nicholson, our Commanding General in Afghanistan, visited me in DC, I told him I'd like to return the favor. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD54ROJW0AIm_pd.jpg

I’m honored to be spending this 4th of July visiting our troops in Afghanistan. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD53wdmXsAAtxIT.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD53wb4XcAAvXb0.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD53wVbXgAA9KQs.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DD53wYQXYAAKexw.jpg
